title: In Game Voice Chat?
body:
So I see that the in-game voice chat is for party-only. That is totally useless. We already got very familiar with using discord and other voice chat systems for premade parties. The whole point of ever implementing in-game voice chat is to make it convenient so that everyone else on the team can join in because it is much more complicated if we have to send them a link in the chat box to discord, and they may not have used discord before, and all that stuff.

People worry about hearing other's BM, then just silence them! What? Never saw people BM with typing chat before? How is it different?
